casebody.data:
PEOPLE
v.
WATSON S240584 Supreme Court of California May 10, 2017

Votes: Cantil-Sakauye, C.J., Werdegar, Chin, Corrigan, Liu, Cuéllar and Kruger, JJ.

The petition for review is granted. Further action in this matter is deferred pending consideration and disposition of a related issue in People v. Padilla, S239454, and People v. Arzate, S238032 (see Cal. Rules of Court, rule 8.512(d)(2) ), or pending further order of the court. Submission of additional briefing, pursuant to **917California Rules of Court, rule 8.520, is deferred pending further order of the court.
